snippet: About 75 percent of shareholders voted in favor of the new class of shares, named Model AA after Toyota’s first car, though foreign funds were opposed.
lead_paragraph: About 75 percent of shareholders voted in favor of the new class of shares, named Model AA after Toyota’s first car, though foreign funds were opposed.

headline.main: Toyota's New Class of Stock Approved Despite Opposition
headline.print_headline: Toyota's New Class of Stock Approved Despite Opposition From Foreign Funds
